snippet.title: Riff Racer [Trailer]
snippet.description:
Out now on PC!  http://bit.ly/rr-steam

Create arcade stunt racetracks from songs / audio in your music library, or from a selection of 25 bundled songs. 

Race the music to stay in sync. Score big by pulling off jumps, drifts and rolls. 

Challenge other racers to your favourite tracks. Have you got what it takes to win at your favourite song?
